T02TD2100E:130a-4: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2100E:130a-5: lus ngag yid gsum rtag tu dang pa yis //
T02TD2100E:130a-6: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la btud de //
T02TD2100E:130a-7: rigs kyi phyag rgya rin chen lta bu yi//
T02TD2100E:130a-8: gang dgongs 'gyur phyir rmi lam bshad par bya //
T02TD2100E:130a-9: ku sha'i gdan la gnas nas kyang //
T02TD2100E:130a-10: dri ldan rtsva la sngas su gzhug / dz'a ta ka yi phreng ba bcing //
T02TD2100E:130a-11: bu mo gzhon nu'i 'o ma la //
T02TD2100E:130a-12: sngags kyi phreng ba bzlas shing bdar //
T02TD2100E:130a-13: gzhan dang ldan pa mig la byugs //
T02TD2100E:130a-14: dang po'i cha ni bag chags 'khrug //
T02TD2100E:130a-15: gnyis par yi dags rgyu bar 'gyur //
T02TD2100E:130a-16: tha mar rmi lam brtags la nyal //
T02TD2100E:130a-17: me long lag tu thogs pa dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-18: tshes gcig zla ba mthong ba dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-19: shing rta'i 'khor lo zhon pa dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-20: gos dkar rgyan dkar gyon pa dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-21: glang po lcags kyus 'dul ba dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-22: snying rjes ded dpon byed pa'o //
T02TD2100E:130a-23: rmi lam na ni gser rnyed dang ;
T02TD2100E:130a-24: / rang bzhin khrus la 'jug pa dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-25: bum pa spyi gtsug bzhag pa dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-26: gling bzhan kun la dbang skyur dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-27: rta zhon nor bu'i glong 'gro dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-29: me tog padmo thu ba dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-30: glegs bam lag na thogs pa dang /
T02TD2100E:130a-31: dung la sogs pa 'bud pa dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-32: me tog phreng pa 'dogs pa dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-33: rma bya rnyi yis 'dzin pa dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-35: mtshon thogs g-yul las rgyal ba dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-36: rgyal po 'khor du gyur pa dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-37: dmag mi g-yul du bskor ba dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-38: zhi ba'i las la 'god pa dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-39: bya shar te ru po nyar gtong //
T02TD2100E:130a-40: nags tshal me yis bsregs pa'o //
T02TD2100E:130a-41: chu la mi nub rkyal ba dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-42: nam mkha' la yang 'gro zhing lding //
T02TD2100E:130a-43: nyi zla rgyan du gon pa dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-44: seng ge khri stan gnon pa dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-45: gdugs dkar phub cing rgyal mtshan bsgreng //
T02TD2100E:130a-47: khrag dang chu ser zag pa dang /
T02TD2100E:130a-48: me dpung rdzi zhing mi 'jigs dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-49: sprul dang sdig pa za ba dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-50: rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-51: ri bo rtse la gnon pa dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-52: grong khyer mdzub mos skyor ba'o //
T02TD2100E:130a-53: bla ma yi dam mchod pa dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-54: glegs bam 'dri zhing mchod rten brtsig / gcer bur byung glu gar byed dang //
T02TD2100E:130a-55: dge slong tshogs dang lhan cig 'grogs //
T02TD2100E:130b-0: gos @130b bzang gyon zhing shing 'bru za //
T02TD2100E:130b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2100E:130b-2: shis pa brjod cing lung ston byed //
T02TD2100E:130b-3: chu yi rdzing chen 'khyil ba dang //
T02TD2100E:130b-4: gnas khang mthon po brtsig pa dang //
T02TD2100E:130b-6: dgra yis rgyan dang bral ba dang //
T02TD2100E:130b-7: na chud mya ngan byed pa dang //
T02TD2100E:130b-8: khri mon nang du bcug pa dang //
T02TD2100E:130b-9: nor phrogs lcags su bcug pa dang //
T02TD2100E:130b-10: 'gro ba ngan pas rdzi ba dang //
T02TD2100E:130b-11: gcan gzan lus la 'phyang ba dang //
T02TD2100E:130b-12: srang bus dkris shing dri mas g-yogs //
T02TD2100E:130b-13: dri ma za zhing dri ma 'thungs //
T02TD2100E:130b-14: bla ma slob dpon grogs po dang //
T02TD2100E:130b-15: pha ma rnams ni mthong nas 'bros //
T02TD2100E:130b-16: shin tu gcong rong mi med dang ;
T02TD2100E:130b-17: / yang na 'brog dgon la sogs par //
T02TD2100E:130b-18: zas dang skom gyis nyam thag ste //
T02TD2100E:130b-19: kyi hud bdag sdug zer gyi g-ya' //
T02TD2100E:130b-20: go cha bshus nas mtshon gyis 'debs //
T02TD2100E:130b-21: nags kyi dkyil na phyin nas kyang //
T02TD2100E:130b-23: de sogs yid gdung bar 'byung ba //
T02TD2100E:130b-24: dge dang mi dge'i ltas su rigs //
T02TD2100E:130b-25: rnam par snang mdzad rin chen 'byung ldan dang //
T02TD2100E:130b-26: 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa dang //
T02TD2100E:130b-27: mi bskyod pa dang rdo rje sems rigs drug / go rims nyid dang sna tshogs 'dres pa'o //
T02TD2100E:130b-28: shis pa'i rmi lam la ni sgrub pa tsam //
T02TD2100E:130b-29: rin chen phyag rgyar bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin //
T02TD2100E:130b-30: mi dge'i ltas la til gyi spyin sreg bya //
T02TD2100E:130b-31: rigs de zhig la stong gis sbyangs pa'o //
T02TD2100E:130b-32: bag chags yi dags yid brid pa //
T02TD2100E:130b-33: 'khor ba'i chos kun rmi lam bzhin //
T02TD2100E:130b-34: rnal 'byor pa yis blta bar bya //
T02TD2100E:130b-35: 'khrul pa yang dag min phyir ro //
T02TD2100E:130b-36: bzang po rtogs las ye shes skye //
T02TD2100E:130b-37: blos brtags don ni skye ba med //
T02TD2100E:130b-38: de phyir gsang sngags rten 'byung gi / thabs la rag las gtso bor gzung //
T02TD2100E:130b-39: byang chub sems bskyed pa dang dbang bskur ba'i //
T02TD2100E:130b-40: rmi lam bstan pa klu sgrub gzhung las btus //
T02TD2100E:130b-41: legs dang nyes pa'i rim pa gsal byed pas //
T02TD2100E:130b-42: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i zhal mthong shog / rmi lam brtag pa //
T02TD2100E:130b-43: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2100E:130b-45: // / rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pra dzny'a shr'i dzny'a na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o /
